item.title: A deeper dive in Elixir's Plug
item.description: Being new to Elixir and Phoenix, I spend quite some time in the projects’ documentation. One thing that stood out for me recently is the first sentence of Phoenix’s Plug documentation: Plug lives at the heart of Phoenixâ€™s HTTP layer and Phoenix puts Plug front and center. So naturally, I felt compelled to take a deeper dive into Plug and understand it better. I hope the following article will help you out in understanding Plug.
